description.value:
Activate 2 Interact

Hunters all over Golarion favor curare, a potent paralytic derived from boiled tree bark.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds (but see stage 3)

Stage 1 @Damage[2d6[poison]], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[3d6[poison]], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} (1 minute)

Stage 3 @Damage[4d6[poison]], clumsy 2, enfeebled 2, and slowed 1 (1 round). If the victim fails the saving throw while at

Stage 3, the poison ends and the victim is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] for [[/r 2d6 #Minutes]]{2d6 minutes}.
